column4: Would anyone have any idea why this entry in crontab doesn't work: (*/15 * * * * /usr/bin/xfdesktop -reload) while this entry does: (*/15 * * * * echo "It works" > ~/readme)?
DISPLAY environment variable is not set for cron
you need to set it, and maybe something more, don't know about xfce
Thanks :) Searched the forums and found how to set it, etc. It's working great now :)
